metadata.synopsis: Gale offers protection to Minsc in the Sorcerous Sundries shop

3.speaker: Minsc
3.text: Minsc has never trusted places such as this. Too much of a wizard's power can be simply packaged and picked up.
3.context: NodeContext: Grumbling as we make our way through the shelves at Sorcerous Sundiries.

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: Well, picked up by all but Minsc. When he touches the many delicate little jars, oh how the wizards shout and stare!
1.context: NodeContext: Revealing that his objection to Sorcerous Sundries is not in fact a deep philosophical belief that wizards have too much power - they just make him feel stupid and awkward when he pokes at their things.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Fear not, Minsc. You have a wizard at your side who positively encourages such curiosity. You'll fit right in.

2.speaker: Minsc
2.text: Obliged, wizard. Should we find our way to a weaponsmith, Minsc will rough you up a little - so that you too can fit in.
2.context: NodeContext: Warm, comradely - would genuinely be doing Gale a favour.
